data.title: Ideas and Advice for Leaders
data.meta_description: Find new ideas and classic advice on strategy, innovation and leadership, for global leaders from the world's best business and management experts.
data.text:
The Business Roundtable's Stakeholder Pledge, Five Years Later

Leaders of top U.S. companies promised a new way of doing business. What happened?

How Starbucks Devalued Its Own Brand

“Going to Starbucks isn’t what it used to be, and the brand itself isn’t what it used to mean.”
